infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: W4nder needs calendar access to find free times for date nights and sync availability with your partner.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: W4nder uses your location to provide directions, travel time estimates, and nearby recommendations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: W4nder uses your location to send travel alerts and notify your partner when you've arrived.

plugins.calendarPermission: W4nder needs calendar access to find free times for date nights and sync availability with your partner.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: W4nder uses your location to send travel alerts and notify your partner when you've arrived.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: W4nder uses your location in the background to provide timely travel alerts.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: W4nder uses your location to provide directions and travel time estimates.
